front.title: Extension to RSVP-TE for signaling control of dynamic Hose-based VPN

abstract.t: This document describes the extension to resource reservation protocol-traffic engineering for signaling control of dynamic Hose- based VPN. The signaling procedure is used to achieve dynamic revision of hose interface. This document proposes a new Hose-Notify message and a series of signaling procedure for extension of RSVP-TE to achieve this function.
